skills.name: React
skills.levelDescription: I can analyse working solutions and propose refactors and generalization

skills.name: Redux
skills.levelDescription:
I am able to keep a normalised state, using complex reducers in order to guarantee immutability and flatten/efficient
 structures

skills.name: Redux-Sagas
skills.levelDescription: I can configure from the scratch a new project

skills.name: i18Next
skills.levelDescription: I can use plurals and I can make it working with all defined languages

skills.name: Express
skills.levelDescription: I understand Request, Response objects, middleware pattern in Express and parametrized routes

skills.name: Systemic
skills.levelDescription: I know about a module called systemic and the basics about injection dependency

skills.name: NPM
skills.levelDescription: I know what is npm link for and how to publish a module in the public registry

skills.name: Webpack
skills.levelDescription: I know  how to install and configure a simple webpack.config.js and run a server with webpack-dev-server

skills.name: Hardware
skills.levelDescription: I have a very basic idea of the most common topics (Libraries, Serial Port, comm, hardware components)

skills.name: Streams
skills.levelDescription: I have a very basic idea of the most common topics (Streams, fs, http...)

skills.name: Testing
skills.levelDescription: I am able to perform TDD in e2e and unit testing environment

skills.name: Security
skills.levelDescription: I have a very basic idea of the most common topics (Injections, dependency hell, etc...)
